definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: I saw people have sex in the alleys.
sentences.chinese: 我看到过有人在小巷中苟合。

sentences.english: For from within, out of the heart of men, proceed evil thoughts, adulteries, fornications, murders.
sentences.chinese: 因为从里面，就是从人心里，发出恶念，苟合。

sentences.english: For from within, out of men's hearts, come evil thoughts, sexual immorality, theft, murder, adultery.
sentences.chinese: 因为从里面，就是从人心里，发出恶念，苟合。

sentences.english: For such an attachment as this, she might have sufficient charms;
sentences.chinese: 象这一类的苟合，丽迪雅的风骚妩媚可能也就足够了。

sentences.english: Do not lie with a man as one lies with a woman; that is detestable.
sentences.chinese: 不可与男人苟合，像与女人一样，这本是可憎恶的。

definition: to carry on a clandestine love affair
to have secret ties with/to be in covert communication with (the enemy etc)/to engage in an illicit sexual relationship/adultery
to have cordial relations with each other/to have sexual intercourse
to have no sense of shame/brazen
